description: Lynks is an e-commerce company that makes high demand products accessible to people in developing countries.
generated_description:
Lynks is an innovative e-commerce platform established to bring high-demand products within reach of consumers in developing countries, specifically catering to customers in Egypt. Founded within the Y Combinator Batch W16, Lynks leverages the power of online shopping to enhance accessibility to international retail.

With a dedicated team of 40 employees, Lynks has created a streamlined process for shopping from various online stores in the US, UK, and UAE. Their website, [Lynks.com](https://www.lynks.com/), empowers users to shop millions of products while enjoying significant discounts on shipping and customs fees, alongside a cashback program that reaches up to 10%.

### Key Features:
1. **Simple Shopping Process**: Enter a product link, fill in shipping details, and receive your order in Egypt within 10 to 15 business days.
2. **Dynamic Partnerships**: Collaborates with major retailers such as Amazon, eBay, and Walmart, providing an extensive catalogue of options.
3. **Cost-Saving Deals**: Offers big discounts on shipping and customs, making the process economically appealing.
4. **Order Tracking & Insurance**: Provides real-time tracking for orders and free insurance, ensuring peace of mind for their customers.

### Mission:
Lynks is driven by the mission to make desirable products seamlessly accessible to those who may otherwise face barriers in international shopping. By focusing on emerging markets, they’re not just selling products but enabling a shift in how consumers in these regions shop and connect with the global marketplace.

Ultimately, Lynks provides a promising model for e-commerce in developing markets, combining practicality with service excellence. If you’re in Egypt and looking to expand your shopping horizons, Lynks is certainly worth checking out!
